pairing_timeout.description:
The device did not enter pairing mode. Click Submit to try again.

### Troubleshooting
1. Check that the device isn't connected to the mobile app.
2. Unplug the device for 5 seconds, then plug it back in.

progress.wait_for_pairing_mode:
To complete setup, put this device in pairing mode.

### How to enter pairing mode
1. Force quit SNOOZ mobile apps.
2. Press and hold the power button on the device. Release when the lights start blinking (approximately 5 seconds).

transition_on.name: Transition on
transition_on.description: Transitions device settings over time. By default, all settings will be read from the the device state.

device_id.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::device%]
device_id.description: The Snooz device whose settings should be transitioned.

duration.name: Transition duration
duration.description: Time it takes to reach the target device settings.

volume.name: Target volume
volume.description: If specified, the device volume setting will transition to this value.

fan_speed.name: Target fan speed
fan_speed.description: If specified, the device fan speed setting will transition to this value. Requires a Breez device.

transition_off.name: Transition off
transition_off.description: Transitions device settings off over time. By default, all device settings will be included in the transition.

duration.name: [%key:component::snooz::services::transition_on::fields::duration::name%]
duration.description: Time it takes to turn off the applicable device settings.

volume.name: Transition volume
volume.description: Includes the device volume in the transition.

fan_speed.name: Transition fan speed
fan_speed.description: Includes the device fan speed in the transition. Requires a Breez device.
